name: homelab
description: Setup and configuration files for my personal home server and VPS. I used Ansible playbooks to be able to replicate this setup in case I replace the hardware for some reason. I should probably use Nix too.

name: automata
description: An npm package that provides a way to create and manipulate finite automatons based on regular expressions. This project also features a webpage in which the user can create, visualize and test an automaton based on a reg-ex.
